name: Animoca Brands
description: Animoca Brands is a Web3 leader that leverages blockchain to deliver digital property rights to consumers around the world to help establish the open metaverse and promote decentralization. We are one of the most active investors in Web3, with a portfolio of over 540 Web3 investments, including Yuga Labs, Axie Infinity, Polygon, Consensys, Magic Eden, Fireblocks, OpenSea, Dapper Labs, Yield Guild Games, and many more. Animoca Brands has been operating validators since 2020 and has expanded to +30 networks with an average uptime above 99.95%, not only are we contributing to the decentralisation of networks with professional in-house technical infrastructure and security capabilities, we also dedicate resources to invest in & grow the ecosystems we are a part of.
